basics.name: Kevin Conti
basics.label: Senior Software Developer / Tech Lead | AI/ML Engineering
basics.summary: Senior Software Developer and Tech Lead specializing in AI/ML engineering with a proven track record building production AI systems using foundation models (Claude/OpenAI/Gemini), LangChain, LangFuse, and modern evaluation frameworks. Combines deep technical expertise in full-stack development (.NET, Python, Azure) with strong leadership experience scaling teams and implementing observability solutions. Previously founded and scaled a profitable SaaS business, bringing entrepreneurial perspective to technical problem-solving.

work.summary: Leading development teams through cloud modernization and AI initiatives at real estate software leader.
highlights: Built AI-powered community search tool POC for parent company FNF using LangChain, LangFuse, and custom evals.
Architected OpenTelemetry implementation across 360 Platform, improving observability and error detection capabilities.
Scaled 360 Platform Team from 1 to 2 teams, reducing developer onboarding time 50% (6-12 months to 3-6 months).
Established developer preview release process, reducing production error rates through early feedback loops.

work.summary: Founded and operated SaaS holding company, building and scaling multiple profitable software products.
Contributed to authentication modernization for enterprise real estate software.
highlights: Integrated Okta authentication platform across applications, modernizing security and user experience.

work.summary: Delivered technical solutions and led teams at Fortune Global 500 investment banking firm.
highlights: Led Amelia AI migration project as Lead Developer, implementing chat-overlay client that increased bot accessibility.
Built C# middleware service saving an estimated $2M annually in support and maintenance costs.

education.area: AI Evals for Engineers and Project Managers

projects.name: Personal Work Operating System
projects.description: Context-aware AI assistant built with Claude Code Agent Harness for task prioritization and workflow automation.
highlights: Engineered progressive disclosure prompts improving agent context management and response accuracy.
Streamlined personal productivity workflows through custom agent instructions and automation.

projects.name: Lead Generation Agent
projects.description: Automated lead enrichment and content mapping pipeline for CTO consulting services.
highlights: Implemented Arize Phoenix for real-time observability and evaluation framework monitoring.
Designed scalable automation pipeline for prospect identification and qualification.

projects.name: Court Transcript Diarization Tool
projects.description: Audio-to-text transcription with automated speaker identification for legal proceedings.
highlights: Leveraged open-source Hugging Face models for speech recognition and speaker separation.
Delivered production-ready Python solution deployed via Google Colab for rapid iteration.
